body:
Hey does anyonoe know of a safe and free video viewing program that can support .flv flies???


Oh also a free editing program for windows :P

title: Video Making Question

replies.body: well camtasia has a free trial thing, so what I do is put in a new email every month, and I can have unlimited trials
